location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.25 of 1825 to Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, from Major Robert Taylor, Political Agent at Basra

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Stannus's letter of 5 July 1825, relating to Gordon Henry Blacksmith's proceedings to Bassora [Basra], and his advance receipt of fifteen rupees for his expenses, which will be repaid to the Bushire treasury.
